commits.content:
<?php

namespace App\Providers;

use Filament\Facades\Filament;
use Illuminate\Support\ServiceProvider;

class FilamentServiceProvider extends ServiceProvider
{
    public function boot()
    {
        Filament::serving(function () {
            // Set brand name or logo
            Filament::brand('Manajemen Penginapan');

            // If you want to set a logo instead of a text brand
            // Filament::logo('images/logo.png', 40); // Adjust the path and size as needed
        });
    }
}
